document_data.name: Rendilar Bluthlock
document_data.mainbody: '''Rendilar Bluthlock''' was a member of the criminal underworld of [[Scornubel]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, [[Tornar]] the Eye carried a message to Rendilar Bluthlock that he could spend freely, backed by [[Belgon Bradaskor]], to send as many people to their deaths as he wished in hunting down [[Shandril Shessair]].{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|66|4}} He led them in the hunt for spellfire.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|131-132|8}} He was slain before the caravan arrived at [[Triel]].
document_data.Rumors: The men under his command were under the impression that one of the caravan's people was a mage from the [[Cult of the Dragon]] who was also a double agent for the [[Arcane Brotherhood]].{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|272|18}}
